thread.title: Tomi Lahren Stuns The Women Of ‘The View’ With Her Stance On Abortion
thread.title_full: Tomi Lahren Stuns The Women Of ‘The View’ With Her Stance On Abortion

author: Charles Campbell
title: Tomi Lahren Stuns The Women Of ‘The View’ With Her Stance On Abortion
text:
Judge Blocks Texas From Cutting Planned Parenthood From Medicaid 
View co-host Sonny Hostin noted that Lahren considers herself pro-choice, despite championing right-wing politics. Lahren responded by calling out people who believe in small government. 
“I’m pro-choice, and here’s why. I am a constitutional, you know, someone that loves the Constitution. I’m someone that’s for limited government. So I can’t sit here and be a hypocrite and say I’m for limited government but I think the government should decide what women do with their bodies,” Lahren explained. Advertisement - story continues below 
“As a Republican, I can say, ‘You know what, I’m for limited government, so stay out of my guns, and you can stay out of my body as well,'” she added. 
The 24-year-old noted that she’s gotten hate from conservative women thanks to her stance on abortion. 
“I think it’s equal attacks from all sides for me,” she said. 
Joy Behar, well-known advocate for progressive causes, agreed with Lahren over her stance. Advertisement - story continues below
